name: Greek Pizza with Spinach, Feta and Olives
author: USA WEEKEND Pam Anderson
summary: Sun dried tomatoes, spinach, and Kalamata olives boldly flavor this easy pizza.
ingredients: ½ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1 tablespoon oil from the sun-dried tomatoes
¼ cup pitted kalamata olives, coarsely chopped
½ small red onion, halved and thinly sliced
directions: Adjust oven rack to lowest position, and heat oven to 450 degrees
Mix mayonnaise, garlic and 1/2 cup feta in a small bowl
Place pizza crust on a cookie sheet; spread mayonnaise mixture over pizza, then top with tomatoes, olives and oregano
Bake until heated through and crisp, about 10 minutes
Toss spinach and onion with the 1 Tb
Top hot pizza with spinach mixture and remaining 1/2 cup feta cheese
Return to oven and bake until cheese melts, about 2 minutes longer
